title: Malibu C Crystal Gel Hair Treatment 5g

cleaned_text: Description | | The Secret Weapon of Top Colourists Malibu C Crystal Gel Natural Wellness Hair Treatment preps hair for all chemical services, while removing build up and discolouration. Immediately rid hair and scalp of damaging deposits! Instantly remove brassiness, leaving a clean canvas for successful colour results. Formulated with a patented, 100% vegan, antioxidant, vitamin-rich complex. Simply mix crystals with warm to discover the benefits of Malibu treatments. Features: Additional Details
